title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, September 9, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of Russian novelist Leo Tolstoy (1828), whose famous tome “War and Peace” was originally titled “1805.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Russian novelist Leo Tolstoy (1828), whose famous tome “War and Peace” was originally titled “1805.”
